reviewText: This movie is James Mason at his best. My wife and I will watch on one of our date days.
I love this movie, I have been waiting for this movie to come to DVD for a long time. James Mason does a great performance as a mean emotionally abusive husband and father. So good!!!

it arrived safely with the other two (Gene Wilder movies) and played with no problem.  no problems with the viewing.  the trip out was very quick and got here before the alloted time.  no complaints from this end!
I've dealt with Amazon before and have no problems with your deliveries.  the people that send them are very prompt.
